O jogo é legal, divertido e viciante seleção de personagens bem vasta (caso compre DLCs) mas, tem 2 problemas que deixam o jogo chato de se jogar e faz você perder o hype. O primeiro é a toxicidade que é bem alta no jogo só que é inegável que em todos jogos online tem, esse é o menor dos problemas mas o maior é o sistema de rank, o que eu quero dizer é que você pode ser rank alto e cair contra um assassino rank alto só que seu time é composto por randoms que são novos no jogo ou o contrário isso que torna o jogo chato de se jogar e te tira do sério.Mas no geral o jogo vai te divertir bastante no início eu jogava mais no xbox aqui tenho poucas horas de jogo mas de vez enquando dou uma jogada.

I have been playing this game for some time now I think it's a goo game. When I first saw it I was not a big Fan because I prefer first person shooter game but a close friend said I should get it. when I tried out I didn't think it was back at all so if you want to try it out go right ahead. But WARNING if you left a game you will be banned for matchmaking for a short time and the more you do it the longer the time. But it will only start small. It's a scary game when you think about it. If you wanna try it out go ahead but I feel like having the DLC's would make it more fun with better and cooler Killer's and other Survivors.

Very fun horror based game that revolves around teamwork and evading. The graphics are very good and if you want a game to play with friends, this game is perfect. I have been playing for roughly a year, and the gameplay is super amazing and fun. Not many issues except the matchmaking is very slow depending if its night or day. If night playing as a killer will be faster matchmaking, but during day playing as survivor is way faster. I do wish they could fix their matchmaking system, but other than that the game is impressive.

Ultimately, this is a very addicting game. If you are looking for a challenging game that will kill hours of your time, this is definitely the game for you. There are so many different approaches you can take and the game play is usually a blast. The losses make the victories much sweeter. You just have to have the patience and willingness to improve. 
There are some frustrations around getting the skills that you would like for your survivor/preferred character. The whole process is very laborious. There are also some pretty serious wait times in between matches. However, that is unlikely the fault of the game.

Great game, as a killer main, some survivors are toxic by tbaging at the end, so if you hate tbaggers, this is not the game for you (sometimes their stupidity leads them to dying, or getting a free hit on them which gives you more bloodpoints {currency}) its a game where you have to play a couple times before you actually start winning, gotta level up a bit to catch up to the people who are max level with level 3 perks, once you get the hang of it you can take them on easily or at least kill half of them. Some killers are MUCH harder to use than the rest of them, dont let the easy, intermidiate, and hard fool you, i found that freddy is easier to play than the trickster, some killers can kill better at the end of the game than early, keep that in mind if you decide to be killer (not much experiance as survivor, tried it, died in the first few seconds) Some killers are nice to people who are obviously new and save them for last so they can play a bit longer. Some killers like the leigion (my favorate) work best when they are highly leveled up, others like the huntress are pretty good starting out when if you have good aim and is powerful without perks when you start the game
